section.p: You line up at a coconut shy, only instead of coconuts the cups contain human heads. When you point out to the stall-holder that this is a rather grisly joke, he can only shrug. ‘I am a worshipper of the god Nagil, and dead things do not revolt me in the least. Anyhow, look along the queue. There are plenty of people willing to throw a few balls if you’re not.’

You throw three balls and manage to win a
pirate captain’s head. Note it on your Adventure Sheet and .
